body:
Comment 8: 
Related to this issue, present better errors for invalid options/combinations of
options, and only show usage information when requested (or no flags at all?)

>go tool cover -coverprofil=c.out
>should say something like
>flag provided but not defined: -coverprofil
>For full usage information, run "go tool cover -help"
>and then
>go tool cover -help
>should dump the big scroll
